mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (video_id, writer, title, content, reg_date) VALUES (#{videoId}, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT review_id, video_id, writer, title, content, date_format(reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as reg_date, view_cnt FROM review WHERE review_id = #{reviewId}
mapper.update: UPDATE review SET review_id = #{reviewId}, video_id = #{videoId}, writer = #{writer}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, reg_date = #{regDate}, view_cnt = #{viewCnt} WHERE review_id = #{reviewId}
